description: The Canada School of Public Service has a requirement to authorize and make available accessibility and usability testing services. These services are essential to ensuring that the Canada School of Public Service designs and delivers accessible learning products through its various programs for federal servants.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Accessibility Testing Service Contract**

### Contract Title and Reference

* Title (English): Accessibility Testing Service Contract
* Title (French): Contrat de services de tests d'accessibilité
* Reference Number: CSPS-ACAN-24KH-1352

### Tender Summary

The Canada School of Public Service (CSPS) seeks a vendor to provide accessibility testing services for the purpose of ensuring that the school's learning products are designed and delivered in a fully accessible manner for all federal employees. The successful candidate will be responsible for conducting accessibility testing using real users of assistive technology to meet accessibility standards and improve the user experience, particularly for individuals with disabilities.

### Contract Details

* Publication Date: May 29, 2024
* Closing Date: June 26, 2024 at 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 19, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: July 18, 2027

### Location and Trade Agreements

* Location: Canada
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement

### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity: Canada School of Public Service
* Address: 373 Sussex Dr., Ottawa, ON K1N 6Z2, Canada

### Contact Information

* Primary Contact: Kristina Hernandez
* Email: solicitation-sollicitation@csps-efpc.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-550-4215

### Attachments

Tender documents are available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39081/acan---qa---en.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39081/acan---final-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39081/acan---qa---en.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39081/acan---final-en.pdf).

This contract has exceeded the tender closing date; thus, it is no longer competitive. 
=====================================
